source.title: Sense of agency in the human brain

confidence_rationale: Comparator and reafference framing supports explicit post-commit responsibility-bearing mismatch channels.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Agency depends on comparing predicted and actual sensory consequences of actions, with distinct neural contributors to comparator processes.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-060 commitment boundary semantics: post-commit error streams become attributable after action execution.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Agency phenomenology extends beyond learning systems; REE mapping should avoid collapsing all comparator signals into one ledger.
mapping.source_context: Review synthesizing motor control, cognition, and agency neuroscience.

confidence_components.notes: Strong conceptual bridge to attributable post-commit error signals.
